scripts.watch: concurrently "npm run watch-js" "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-example"
scripts.watch-example: rollup --watch -f iife -n example --globals simple-web:web --intro "const global=window;" -i example/index.js -o dist/example.js -m dist/example.map
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css && npm run build-example
scripts.build-example: rollup --compact -f iife -n example --globals simple-web:web --intro "const global=window;" -i example/index.js -o dist/example.min.js -m dist/example.min.map
